name: Sol
description:
Sol is currently a demo game that lasts about 15 minutes. Sol is a 3D exploration narrative puzzle game told through the perspective of a next generation rover activated to investigate the disappearance of missing colonists. Explore the beautiful landscape of this foreign planet, solve puzzles to help you progress, and soak up the narrative of this game.

If you get stuck and would like to flip over press R or Y on the keyboard.

Credits

Special thanks to Anne Cunningham who helped us define the narrative in not only this demo, but the future progress of the game.
